text: Graziella Galvani (27 June 1931 – 25 August 2022) was an Italian actress. Her best known roles were in Kapò (1960), Ghosts of Rome (1961), Shivers in Summer (1963), Pierrot le Fou (1965), El Diablo también llora (1965), Nick Carter and Red Club (1965), Unknown Woman (1969), Open Letter to an Evening Daily (1970), Fiorina la vacca (1972), Seduction (1973), Miracles Still Happen (1974), La terrazza (1980) and Tre colonne in cronaca (1990). Galvani died on 25 August 2022 in Urbino, Italy at the age of 91.Graziella Galvani, la leggerezza del palcoscenico ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian television actors Category:Actors from Milan
title: Graziella Galvani
